meanings.definition: A tool used to remove the zest from citrus fruits.
meanings.sent1: I used the zesters to grate the outer peel of the lemon.
meanings.sent2: The kitchen store sells various zesters for different types of fruits.
meanings.sent3: The zesters in the kitchen drawer were having a race to see who could zest the fastest.
meanings.sent4: Her zesters were like tiny magic wands, transforming the oranges into flavorful zest.
meanings.sent5: The zesters gleamed in the sunlight, ready to add a burst of citrus flavor to the dish.

meanings.sent1: The zesters at the market were experts at adding zest to dishes.
meanings.sent2: She joined the group of zesters at the cooking class to learn their techniques.
meanings.sent3: The zesters at the party were the life of the event, zesting lemons with flair.
meanings.sent4: In the kitchen, the zesters worked together like a well-oiled zest-removing machine.
meanings.sent5: The zesters' hands moved swiftly, turning oranges into fragrant zest in seconds.
